body_html:
I like the way LInkedIn offers pre-approval on invites.
Students could pre-assign coaches before they ask the coach to join, pre-assigned coaches could add themselves to the team without waiting.
body_text:

Students could pre-assign coaches before they ask the coach to join, pre-assigned coaches could add themselves to the team without waiting.
body:
I like the way LInkedIn offers pre-approval on invites. 
Students could pre-assign coaches before they ask the coach to join, pre-assigned coaches could add themselves to the team without waiting.
